Posts.Title: chemo side effects

Posts.Content: Thanks katee, the first lot of chemo had me lead up in bed for 5 days with sickness which then lead to me getting a DVT so now have to be injected every day for 3 months,  then I was hospitalised the 2nd week due to my neutrophils dropping to flat and didn't go over 0.4 for 14 days so I was in an isolation room, that was the first chemo, oh that goes along with losing my hair and mouth ulcers,  2nd chemo I had horrendous diarrhoea,  lost taste buds couldn't eat or drink still had mouth ulcers,  this last chemo gave me the sickness,  mouth ulcers and constipation which has now left me with a anal fissure which now means it is so painful to go to the toilet I dread it and struggle to walk once I have gone, I think that's it lol, what is the tax like hun????? Xxx thank you for the cyber hug xxx
